about_the_game:
"We've had this conversation before, haven't we?" says the shadow on the doorway.

Trapped within a spiral, Laura must carve her way through the depths of her unconscious mind or sink into the void.

Retro Survival Horror 

Find supplies and survive as you navigate a deserted town with monsters that will haunt you around every corner.

Psychological Nightmare

The environment will change with every loop, becoming more corrupted as you unearth previous buried trauma.

Fight your way out

Equipped with various weapons, Laura is not utterly hopeless against her pursuers. Fight through the nightmare and earn your life back, or die trying.

Solve puzzles and uncover the truth.

Some truths hide in plain sight; others require key pieces of your memories to unlock. Solve these puzzles to unlock new areas and peel back the curtain of painful memories you forgot.

name: Comatose

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 Or Later
  • Processor: 2.4GHZ Dual Core Processor Or Higher
  • Graphics: GeForce 9800GT Or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: 2.4 GHZ Quad Core Processor Or Higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 460 Or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: After going through a traumatic experience, Laura finds herself trapped within a looping nightmare inside her comatose brain. Fight monsters as you process your trauma and look for the door that will lead you back into the real world.
supported_languages:
English*, Portuguese - Brazil*
*languages with full audio support
